attributes.review: This app is disgusting it glitches like crazy 😝 it kicked me off the app and it messes with my phone it’s deleting my pictures by itself💕😹❤️
attributes.title: ✨Horrible 🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.review: My phone crashed as soon as I downloaded the app and I immediately got a phone call from DC that hung up so I deleted the app. Clearly a scam
attributes.title: Phone crashed

attributes.review: The app glitches and if forced you to click thing you don’t want to press on and it has an ugly orange looking man monster all over it. A WASTE OF TIME!
attributes.title: Awful 🤢

attributes.review: i downloaded this app in hopes of getting closer to my conservative peers and getting updates from President Trump, but the app was so terribly laid out i converted to marxism. this app is awful!
attributes.title: terrible layout!

attributes.review: Ok so, basically this app made my phone crash multiple times already and its been bothering me so, just dont get the app.
attributes.title: Go away😌

attributes.review: this app barely works and i expected much better ive knewly beena anti-trump but i still figured you know if he cant run a country atleast he can make an app!! well. NO HE CANNOT HE KEEPS PROVING ME HE CANT DO ANYTHING GOOD ESPECIALLY WITH THIS APP.
attributes.title: this is not what i expected

attributes.review: I was so happy to download a app to support my least favorite ✨hot Cheeto✨. So I was waiting my good 5 minutes and then this terrible, horrifying, soul sucking creature popped up..... it was trump and now I’m scarred for life😖
attributes.title: Worst thing ever

attributes.review: This app is the worst I have ever used and TRACKS YOUR LOCATION. It LISTENS to your conversations and RECORDS DATA. It takes forever to load and is very glitchy! never again!
attributes.title: Doesn’t work

attributes.review: So there are so many technical glitches and it’s also very frustrating getting in the app
attributes.title: This app trash

attributes.review: I’m gonna make it short and simple this trash app needs to be taken off the app store. Waste pf time and a huge disappointment, just like the current president
attributes.title: Trash app DO NOT DOWNLOAD
